data.title: Sands TP Lurk + Trademark
data.description: Use this simple, but effective set up to apply pressure towards Sands and the A Site.

data.title: A Spawn Lurk + Trademark
data.description: Here's a great way to push for an aggressive fight towards Defenders spawn when executing the A Site or when you are lurking, as it really changes your position to somewhere unexpected, keeping Defenders guessing.

data.title: B Tower Rendezvous to Lock Down B Arcade
data.description: Use this post plant setup after your team has taken control of B Site and B Tower to help lock down Arcade, and create options for how you can play from inside of Arcade to help your team hold down B Site.
